titleStmt.title: The revelation of revelations particularly as an essay towards the unsealing, opening and discovering the seven seals, the seven thunders, and the New-Jerusalem state ... / published by J.L. ...
titleStmt.author: Lead, Jane, 1623-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by A. Sowle ... also by J. Lead ...

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Jane Lead by Wing and NUC pre-1959 imprints.

Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
